Package edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.fridge

Class FridgeServiceImplementation

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.fridge.FridgeServiceImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
FridgeService
@Service public class FridgeServiceImplementation extends Object implements FridgeService
This class is an implementation of the FridgeService interface, providing methods for managing fridges in the system. It handles the business logic for operations related to fridges, including adding, updating, retrieving, and deleting fridges. It uses the FridgeRepository and HouseholdRepository to interact with the database and apply the necessary changes.

  • Method Details

    • castFridgetoToDto

      private FridgeDto castFridgetoToDto(Fridge fridge)
      Converts a Fridge object to a FridgeDto object using ModelMapper. This method simplifies the process of converting between the domain model and the data transfer object.
      Parameters:
      fridge - The Fridge object to be converted.
      Returns:
      A FridgeDto object with the same properties as the given Fridge object.

    • castDtoToFridge

      private Fridge castDtoToFridge(FridgeDto fridgeDto)
      Converts a FridgeDto object to a Fridge object using ModelMapper. This method simplifies the process of converting between the data transfer object and the domain model.
      Parameters:
      fridgeDto - The FridgeDto object to be converted.
      Returns:
      A Fridge object with the same properties as the given FridgeDto object.

    • addFridge

      public FridgeDto addFridge(FridgeDto fridgeDto)
      Adds a new Fridge to the database. This method validates the input FridgeDto, converts it to a Fridge object, associates it with the specified household, and persists it to the database.
      Specified by:
      addFridge in interface FridgeService
      Parameters:
      fridgeDto - A FridgeDto object representing the new Fridge to be added.
      Returns:
      A FridgeDto object representing the new Fridge that was added to the database.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the FridgeDto name is empty or null, if the household ID does not exist in the database, if a Fridge with the same name already exists for the household, or if the household already has a fridge.

    • updateFridge

      public FridgeDto updateFridge(FridgeDto fridgeDto)
      Updates an existing Fridge in the database. This method validates the input FridgeDto, retrieves the existing Fridge from the database, updates its properties, and saves the changes back to the database.
      Specified by:
      updateFridge in interface FridgeService
      Parameters:
      fridgeDto - A FridgeDto object representing the Fridge to be updated.
      Returns:
      A FridgeDto object representing the updated Fridge in the database.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the FridgeDto ID or name is empty or null, if the Fridge does not exist in the database, if the household ID does not exist in the database, or if a Fridge with the same name already exists for the household.

    • getFridgeById

      public FridgeDto getFridgeById(Long fridgeId)
      Retrieves a Fridge from the database by its ID.
      Specified by:
      getFridgeById in interface FridgeService
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - A Long representing the ID of the Fridge to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A FridgeDto object representing the retrieved Fridge.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Fridge with the given ID does not exist in the database.

    • deleteFridge

      public void deleteFridge(Long fridgeId)
      Deletes a Fridge from the database by its ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteFridge in interface FridgeService
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - A Long representing the ID of the Fridge to delete.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Fridge with the given ID does not exist in the database.
